name: mbrwp
description: Docker boilerplate for wordpress based on laradock

scripts.docker:build:all: docker-compose build workspace php-fpm nginx apache2 mysql adminer
scripts.docker:build:all:nocache: docker-compose build --no-cache workspace php-fpm nginx apache2 mysql adminer
scripts.docker:up:nginx: docker-compose up -d workspace nginx mysql adminer
scripts.docker:up:apache2: docker-compose up -d workspace apache2 mysql adminer
scripts.wp:bedrock:download: docker-compose exec -T --user=laradock workspace composer create-project roots/bedrock .
scripts.wp:default:download: docker-compose exec -T --user=laradock workspace wp core download
scripts.wp:cli:permalinks:rewrite: docker-compose exec -T --user=laradock workspace wp rewrite structure '/%postname%/'
scripts.//: note: add rest of laradock as submodule if you want to add something from there

author: Mark B. Refsing
